title: The Dark Web and Loss of American Tech Jobs - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/2/18
itunes:title: The Dark Web and Loss of American Tech Jobs - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/2/18
description:
George Noory and technology reporter Hillary Gamm discuss the threats to Americans' private data through hacking, and what will happen to the US economy if the country continues to lose technology jobs to overseas companies.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
